title: quarkus update fail
body:
### Describe the bug

running quarkus 3.2 cli, on a mvn project using quarkus.patlform.version 2.12.2 and plugin.version 2.12.2 I get this exception after lots of updating:



```
[INFO] [INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    ```
